conbody.p: This chapter describes the system preferences available in the NCC. System preferences are properties that you can view or configure using the Global Configurations â€“> Application Preferences hamburger menu ( ) to assist in understanding and controlling system behavior. You can select either the Service Manager or the Managed Elements option from the hamburger menu. The Service Manager option opens the SM System Configuration page. The Managed Elements option opens to the ME system configuration selection list, where you can select the ME required.
Only the configured system preferences for the ME (applications) that you need to work in (for example, policy, NS, Diameter, or NCC) appears in the GUI.
